statements: UPDATE FishPopulationHealth SET health_status='Good', population_size=500 WHERE population_id=1;
UPDATE FishPopulationHealth SET disease_diagnosis='Mild Infection', treatment_plan='Antibiotics' WHERE species='Salmon';
UPDATE FishPopulationHealth SET population_size = 10000, average_weight = 2.5, health_status = 'Healthy' WHERE population_id = 1;
UPDATE FishPopulationHealth SET treatment_plan = 'Administer antibiotics and monitor progress', disease_diagnosis = 'Fungal infection', health_status = 'Sick' WHERE species = 'Trout';
UPDATE FishHealthRecord SET health_status = 'Good', disease = 'None' WHERE fish_id = 1;
UPDATE WaterQualityRecord SET temperature = 25.5, ph_level = 7.2 WHERE record_id = 100;
UPDATE FishHealthRecord SET health_status='Excellent', treatment_plan='Increase feed frequency' WHERE fish_id=1;
UPDATE WaterQualityRecord SET ph_level=7.2, dissolved_oxygen=8.5 WHERE sample_date='2022-01-15';
UPDATE FishPopulations SET population_size = 100 WHERE species = 'Salmon';
UPDATE DiseaseRecords SET treatment_plan = 'Antibiotics' WHERE disease_name = 'Lice' AND treatment_plan IS NULL;
UPDATE FishPopulations SET population_size = 1500, health_status = 'good' WHERE species = 'Salmon' AND location = 'Pacific Ocean';
UPDATE TreatmentHistory SET treatment_date = '2022-09-15', treatment_type = 'Medication', treatment_success = true WHERE history_id = 10;
UPDATE FishSpecies SET average_size = 25.5 WHERE species_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE PopulationStatistics SET total_population = 5000, average_age = 4 WHERE species_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE FishSpecies SET average_size = 25.5, habitat = 'Freshwater' WHERE species_id = '886317ff-2b5f-49a9-bd6a-909d706206d5';
UPDATE HealthRecords SET health_status = true, water_quality = 'Good' WHERE record_id = 'e3e744c0-da06-4f42-afad-1e4a2f29f4fd';
UPDATE Fish_Populations SET health_status='Good' WHERE fish_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Treatments SET treatment_description='Apply medication twice a day' WHERE disease_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Fish_Populations SET health_status='Good', location='Pacific Ocean' WHERE fish_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Treatments SET treatment_description='New Treatment Description', treatment_name='Enhanced Treatment' WHERE disease_id='223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
